title: Secrets - New Girl
description: Updated to combine second book!Every town has secrets. Moving three times in her senior year of high school leaves Lexie with no social life and no friends. But maybe the move to DelaRosa will change all that? Just when Lexie settles in to her new home and school, a secret about the town and her new group of friends emerges. Werewolves? Vampires? Shape shifters? Do they exist or is this just a joke on the new girl?
author: Patti Bricker
